short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a useful extension to extend roblox with customised features and helpful utilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
make your roblox experience better. theming, trading and other utilities combined in one simple plugin, with regular updates.

features include:
• a theming engine
   •  theme editor coming soon!
• Rolimons
   •  audio notifications for the deals page
   •  a hide feature for each limited item
• Roblox Catalog
   • immediate colored resale price

disclaimer: the colored resale price is good for quick flipping of items, but just because an item doesn't have the best price now doesn't mean it isn't a good investment for future selling. equally, an item could go either up or down in value after purchase. rotheme is a third-party Chrome browser extension and is not affiliated with Roblox or Rolimons. any Roblox purchases made are fully at the user's discretion.
